jobInfo.Jobdescription:
The ideal candidate will be passionate about technology and possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills. This role offers the opportunity to work closely with clients to understand their business needs and promote our suite of SAAS (Software as a Service) Solutions.

 

Key Responsibilities:

 

·     Identify and qualify leads through prospecting, networking, and cold calling.

·     Conduct thorough needs analysis to understand clients' business requirements and pain points.

·     Present and demonstrate our SAAS Solutions to prospective clients, highlighting key features and benefits.

·     Collaborate with the sales team to develop and execute sales strategies to meet or exceed sales targets.

·     Prepare and deliver sales proposals, quotes, and presentations tailored to the needs of individual clients.

·     Build and maintain strong relationships with clients through regular communication and follow-up.

·     Provide timely and accurate sales forecasts and reports to management.

·     Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new business opportunities.

 

Requirements:

 

·     Bachelor’s degree in business administration/marketing/Information Technology, or related field with 1 or more then years of experience.  Fresh graduates can also be considered.

·     Eager to make a Career in Sales/Business development.

·     Knowledge of enterprise software solutions, preferably SAAS based or ERP or CRM Systems.

·     Must have good grasp in Digital marketing and some technology understand.

·     Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.

·     Ability to understand and articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.

·     Self-motivated with a positive attitude and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

·     Excellent consultative sales approach is required.

·     Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, OneSignal Product).
